name: Kana... Okaeri!
description:
Kana has a terrible disease and has spent move of her life in and out of the hospital. Takamichi Toudou, her older brother, would do anything to make her well. When he learn the terrible news that Kana can only live another six months at most, his frustration and powerlessness come to a boil. Despite the jealous attention of his girlfriend, Yumi, he starts to experience feelings of romantic love for his sister... especially after he discovers his family's secret. Will he seek for a way to save Kana, or surrender to her destiny, spending the last of their time together?

Kana ~ Okaeri (Welcome Home Kana), is the complete re-make of one of the most beautiful Japanese visual novels ever made, featuring updated graphics and character voices, and updated game engine. This version also includes high resolution game art and animated sex scenes. Written by Romeo Tanaka, the renowned creator of Yume Miru Kusuri (A Drug That Makes You Dream) and Kazoku Keikaku (Family Project). The new illustrations by Ayakaze Ryosho bring new life to this classic story. Kana ~ Okaeri is a dramatic multi-scenario game that explores the nature of love, family and mortality. You play the interactive game by moving through the story and making choices that affect the outcome, allowing for many different potential endings and excellent replay value. A wonderful way to experience the journey of Kana all over again...
